metadata.description:
NTpunks consist of 4,444 carefully crafted art pieces. Each with specific traits complementing the OG Crypto Punks, Japanes
e Culture, Neon Lights of Tokyo, and Combat in NeoTokyo. Created by Masamune,Kataku, & Nation, NTpunks is built to showcase o
ur passion for pixelated art and our elasticity to take it into a 3d metaverse with a P2E game.
metadata.name: NeoTokyoPunks #1
